short_summary: Need for cleaning, gardening, and handyman personnel at the Canadian Embassy in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, in Kinshasa. The Embassy of Canada in the Democratic Republic of the Congo in Kinshasa requires cleaning, gardening, and handyman services. This contract is for a list of requirements to obtain a solution that will allow the assignment of qualified resources to perform cleaning, gardening, and handyman tasks (plumbing, electricity, carpentry, masonry, etc.) for the facilities of the Embassy of Canada in the Democratic Republic of the Congo in Kinshasa, in accordance with industry standards, in order to maintain the cleanliness of the premises, the maintenance of its grounds, and to ensure the proper functioning of the facilities.
description: Cleaning/gardening services required for the following locations:\n- Embassy (Chancellery):\\n  - 17, Pumbu Ave, Municipality of Gombe, Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo \\.\",
